name: Bubble hunt
description:
Bubble hunt - a game in which you need to pop bubbles with the help of a gorpoon on a chain. By collecting points for bursting bubbles, you can get extra lives.
A double horn can also fall out, which will help to deal with bubbles twice as efficiently. There are several types of bubbles.
Some fly according to the laws of physics, but some fly bouncing off walls, others fall apart. You need to look for your own approach to each IP.
The seemingly simple gameplay is actually quite difficult. You need attentiveness, dexterity and ingenuity to win.

-Beautiful graphics

-Interesting gameplay

-Difficult levels
